response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value and significance, and we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs and aspirations. Given its intrinsic worth and the unique benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive invitation to purchase this product at a special introductory price of $995,000.

This offer represents a significant discount compared to the market value, providing you with an unparalleled chance to secure a high-quality asset at an attractive price. We understand that such an investment requires careful consideration, and we are confident that once you experience the product's capabilities, you will appreciate its true worth.

Please let us know if you require any further information or demonstrations to help you make an informed decision. We are here to assist you every step of the way.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 995000}
